name: Poké Healer +
effect: You may play 2 Poké Healer + at the same time. If you play 1 Poké Healer +, remove 1 damage counter and a Special Condition from 1 of your Active Pokémon. If you play 2 Poké Healer +, remove 8 damage counters and all Special Conditions from 1 of your Active Pokémon.
author: Ryo Ueda
